ocedata 0.2.3
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

RRprofile

Seawater profile used by Reiniger and Ross (1968)

beaufort

Beaufort Scale relationship wave height to wind speed

buoy

Measurements made at a buoy off Halifax

coastlineWorldFine

World coastline at fine-scale (1:10M) resolution

coastlineWorldMedium

World coastline at medium-scale (1:50M) resolution

conveyor

Conveyor-belt path

drag

Wind drag coefficient

endeavour

Cook's Endeavour cruise track

geosecs235

GEOSECS station 235 data

giss

Time series of NASA/GISS land-ocean temperature index

gs

Gulf Stream position

levitus

Annually-averaged sea-surface temperature and salinity

munk

Munk's (1966) temperature profile

nao

North Atlantic Oscillation Index

oce-class

Base Class for oce Objects

oceans

Geometries of the five world oceans

papa

OWS Papa hydrographic record during 2010

redfieldNC

Redfield's (1934) NO3 and total CO2 data

redfieldNP

Redfield's (1934) NO3 and PO4 data

redfieldPlankton

Redfield's (1934) Table II

riley

Riley's (1946) observation/theory of phytoplankton concentration

schmitt

Schmitt's (1981) NACW temperature-salinity data

secchi

Secchi depth dataset

soi

Southern Oscillation Index

topo2

World topography on a 2-degree grid

turbulence

Grant et al. (1962) turbulence data

wilson

Wilson's (1963) table of seafloor spreading

Contents

Developed by Dan Kelley, Clark Richards.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
